pecially colostrum feeding within an hour of birth.
/circle6 Do not give any pre-lacteal feeds.
/circle6 Ensure good attachment of the baby to the breast.
/circle6 Exclusively breastfeed the baby for six months.
/circle6 Breastfeed the baby whenever he/she demands milk.
/circle6 Follow the practice of rooming in.
